dict.string:
This is an automated email message from <insert name> at <insert school name>: In <insert class name>, %S was %A at least %D times between the dates of %B and %E. If you would like to discuss this report with me personally, please feel free to email, call, or come by my office hours to discuss.
Sincerely,
<insert name> <insert email address> <insert work phone number> Office Hours: <insert office hours>

This is an automated email message from <insert name> at <insert school name>: In <insert class name>, %S was missing at least %D assignments between the dates of %B and %E. If you would like to discuss this report with me personally, please feel free to email, call, or come by my office hours to discuss.
Sincerely,
<insert name> <insert email address> <insert work phone number> Office Hours: <insert office hours>

This is an automated email message from <insert name> at <insert school name>: In <insert class name>, %S had an overall grade of %A %D% between the dates of %B and %E. If you would like to discuss this report with me personally, please feel free to email, call, or come by my office hours to discuss.
Sincerely,
<insert name> <insert email address> <insert work phone number> Office Hours: <insert office hours>
